QuestData.Title: The Fallen Pillar
QuestData.Description: The titans shaped entire life forms here, fostering their unfettered growth.$B$BThe five crystal pillars that surround the basin emanate pure lifeforce. The Scourge should've never been able to penetrate the basin, but one of the pillars was destroyed.$B$BGo to the Lifeblood Pillar and see if you can find out what happened. No undead would've been able to approach the pillar, so keep your eyes out for living intruders. You'll find what remains of the pillar directly south of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Lifeblood Pillar and look for clues to its destruction.
QuestData.RewardText: <The corpse is badly burnt. There appear to be the remains of several powder kegs in the vicinity.>
